attributes.action: Call an early general election before article 50 is activated.
attributes.additional_details:
Fixed term parliament act. http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN06111
Lisbon treaty article 50. 
http://www.lisbon-treaty.org/wcm/the-lisbon-treaty/treaty-on-European-union-and-comments/title-6-final-provisions/137-article-50.html
attributes.background: Table a motion of no confidence in the current government and therefore call an early general election as per the Fixed Term Parliments Act  2011. This is to allow a new chamber to be elected that truly reflects the current will of the people before article 50 of the Lisbon Treatey is activated.
